author: EXM7777
text:
your environment has a BIG impact on your life...

probably has more leverage than your own effort tbh

i didn't get "better" when i left europe for south-east asia
i removed the things that made basic execution expensive

e.g. you can't aim to get lean all year if the closest gym is 1hr away from where you live

sometimes getting closer to your goals simply means getting closer to them... physically

but if you're pushing uphill every day just to do normal things... you're making it much much harder

if you want to film vlogs -> move somewhere that doesn't look depressing
if you want to train hard daily -> live near a gym
if you want to build -> be where builders are

this sounds obvious, yet 90% of people obsess over their calendar and never touch their location

you can't discipline your way out of a bad environment

you can only move
